alert.note: Alert for Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County; Logan County; Morgan County; Northeast Weld County; Phillips County; Sedgwick County; Washington County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued October 13 at 2:41AM MDT until October 14 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FRIDAY FROM 12 PM TO 6 PM MDT FRIDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE NORTHEASTERN PLAINS OF COLORADO FOR ZONES 238, 242, 244, 248, 249, 250, and 251... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FRIDAY AFTERNOON FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE NORTHEASTERN COLORADO PLAINS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 238, 242, 244, 248, 249, 250, AND 251... The National Weather Service in Denver has issued a Fire Weather Watch for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect Friday afternoon. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 238, 242, 244, 248, 249, 250 and 251. * Timing...12 PM Friday afternoon until 6 PM MDT Friday evening * Winds...Northwest 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 13 percent. * Impacts...Above normal temperatures, low relative humidity, and breezy conditions could lead to rapid fire spread for ready to burn fuels. Avoid any burning or outdoor activities that may produce a spark and start a wildfire.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
